text: Rekreatur is Equilibrium's third full-length album, which was released on 18 June 2010.Official Equilibrium Myspace blog The band released the music video for "Der Ewige Sieg" on 16 June 2010. On 11 June, the album in its entirety was available for streaming from the band's official MySpace until 18 June. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Chart (2010) !Peak position |- | German Albums Chart | style="text-align:center;"|20 |} ==Personnel== * Robert "Robse" Dahn – lead vocals * René Berthiaume – guitar/keyboards * Andreas Völkl – guitar * Sandra Völkl – bass * Manuel DiCamillo – drums ==In popular culture== * YouTuber MeltingMan234 uses the acoustic version of "Heimwärts" as his intro.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ahw4v6U5gK4 ==References== Category:2010 albums Category:Equilibrium (band) albums Category:Nuclear Blast albums
title: Rekreatur
